property.name: offer_key
property.value: Rabbits are one of Australia's most destructive pest animals. They also spread the Zombo Virus. Accept this quest to help eliminate 25 rabbits. XP, Dukes, and 1 Skill Point for your troubles.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to take responsibility of a random FriendZ. Move to an open area to allow a FriendZ to be summoned. Feed 100 meat to hire. There are 8 in total - Desert Eagle Tom, M60 Dave, AK47 Momma, T.A. Rifle Business Man, SMG Marlene, Magnum Biker, Sniper Burnt, and Auto Moe.

property.value: Move to an open area to allow a random FriendZ to be summoned.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to take responsibility of a random Animal Helper. Move to an open area to allow an Animal Helper to be summoned. Feed 20 meat to hire. There are 8 in total - Zombie Dog Helper, Boar Helper, Dire Wolf Helper, Chicken Helper, Rabbit Helper, Snake Helper, Coyote Helper, and Jeerkoa Helper.
